title: 114_hr108
content: AMENDMENTS RELATING TO THE CIVIL SERVICE RETIREMENT SYSTEM. Section 8335a of Title 5, United States Code, states that Members of Congress will no longer be subject to retirement coverage under this subchapter, and no further Government contributions or deductions will be made for them. This does not affect any rights or benefits accrued prior to this change and does not impact their eligibility for the Thrift Savings Plan. Members of Congress are no longer covered by retirement benefits under Title 5, United States Code. This change does not affect their eligibility for the Thrift Savings Plan. Regulations for this section may be prescribed by the Director of the Office of Personnel Management and the Executive Director. Termination of retirement coverage for Members of Congress under Title 5, United States Code. This change does not impact eligibility for the Thrift Savings Plan. Regulations may be prescribed by the Director of the Office of Personnel Management and the Executive Director. Termination of retirement coverage for Members of Congress under Title 5, United States Code. Effective after the first day of the first Congress following the enactment of this section, Members who first joined before that day will no longer be covered by this chapter after completing 5 years of service. No further Government contributions will be made for them. After completing 5 years of service, Members of Congress who joined before the first day of the first Congress following the enactment of this section will no longer be subject to this chapter. Government contributions or deductions from basic pay will not be made for them. This does not affect any rights or benefits prior to the specified date. Participation in the Thrift Savings Plan remains unaffected. After 5 years of service, Members of Congress are no longer subject to certain provisions. Participation in the Thrift Savings Plan remains unaffected. Regulations for this section may be prescribed by specific officials. Termination of retirement coverage for Members of Congress after 5 years of service, Thrift Savings Plan participation unaffected. Regulations may be prescribed by specific officials.
